abstract: For Minnesota-based Mosaic, the deal gives it a foothold in Latin America’s largest economy, which boasts a strong agriculture sector.
snippet: For Minnesota-based Mosaic, the deal gives it a foothold in Latin America’s largest economy, which boasts a strong agriculture sector.
lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO — The Brazilian mining giant Vale has reached an agreement to sell much of its fertilizer assets to the Mosaic Company of the United States in a deal worth $2.5 billion, the companies said on Monday.

headline.main: Vale of Brazil Sells Fertilizer Business to Mosaic for $2.5 Billion
headline.print_headline: Vale Sells Fertilizer Business to Mosaic
